column5: Well, some of the reports are flying in and from a distance it is bringing back a lot of memories.  Sounds like everyone had a blast.  Congrats, Great to see you guys are carrying on the traditions.  Next thing you know someone will make a post looking for a swill at the firehall at Bronte.  F.F.#2...Keep the streak alive?  Get some folks out the firehall for some wings and beers...and call Colin to head the table.  DANG, Beer, Wings, Elitism.
